import React from 'react' import './Payment.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import firebaseConfig from "../firebase"; const Payment = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [loader, setLoader] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoader(true); firebaseConfig.firestore().collection("contacts") .add({ name: name, email: email, message: message, }) .then(() => { setLoader(false); alert("Your message has been submitted👍"); }) .catch((error) => { alert(error.message); setLoader(false); }); setName(""); setEmail(""); setMessage(""); }; return( <> <>
